channel.title: IM haveing some server script problems
channel.description:
Well i think these are script problems..
I dont know how to make it stop snowing... (im useing cheesescape) ... i looked and i didnt find anything... and also.. Im wondering if anyone was the script to fix the stacking error my server has? (example: I withdraw 1gp. I with draw another 1gp. it then takes up 2 spaces. I withrdraw another 1gp... so now i have spaces taken up buy 3 1gps...)[br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2007, 09:40:59 AM[/size][hr]BUMP

item.title: IM haveing some server script problems
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

this has nothing to do with scar. http://moparisthebest.com/smf

as for the snowing. try searching your client.java for snowing = true or something along those lines.

Read full topic
